DataElement.preferredName: Regulatory Authority Or Monitoring Regulation Management Authority Professional Organization or Group Jurisdiction Authority Code ISO21090.CD.v1.0
DataElement.preferredDefinition: A coded value specifying the type of governance over which an authority has to make laws and enforce them. EXAMPLE(S): The Food and Drug Administration (FDA) exercises responsibility for pharmacovigilance (jurisdictionAuthorityCode) in the United States (jurisdictionTerritoryCode).

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Regulatory Authority Or Monitoring Regulation Management Authority Professional Organization or Group Jurisdiction Authority Code
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A geopolitical organization responsible for regulating products used in health care.:An article used to connect words, phrases, or clauses representing alternatives; used to connect alternative terms for the same thing; used in correlation; used to correct or rephrase what was previously said; otherwise.:The act of observing something (and sometimes keeping a record of it).:A rule or order issued by an authority stating what may or may not be done or how something must be done.:The act of conducting, controlling or supervising something.:A person or group with the power or right to give orders or make decisions for a particular area of activity.:A formal group of people that exists to further a particular profession._The territory within which power can be exercised.:A person or group with the power or right to give orders or make decisions for a particular area of activity.:A symbol or combination of symbols which is given an arbitrary meaning within a systematized collection of concepts used for data representation.

Concepts.definition: A geopolitical organization responsible for regulating products used in health care.

An article used to connect words, phrases, or clauses representing alternatives; used to connect alternative terms for the same thing; used in correlation; used to correct or rephrase what was previously said; otherwise.
The act of observing something (and sometimes keeping a record of it).
A rule or order issued by an authority stating what may or may not be done or how something must be done.
The act of conducting, controlling or supervising something.
A person or group with the power or right to give orders or make decisions for a particular area of activity.
A formal group of people that exists to further a particular profession.

Concepts.definition: The territory within which power can be exercised.
A person or group with the power or right to give orders or make decisions for a particular area of activity.
A symbol or combination of symbols which is assigned to the members of a collection.
